Title: Mystic: Ephemeral Pursuit
Descriptions: Survivor, within Skalisty's shadows, a mystic vision unveils a chilling tale. Seek a time traveler's stash in the haunted North Tisy Military Base for a cryptic clue and whispers of arcane might. Tread cautiously, locate his camp, unveil crusade armor, and delve into unsettling North Tisy. This mission is a stepping stone, part of a larger pursuit to capture the elusive traveler. Guided by spectral stones, unravel his secrets, knowing it's a fragment in the mysterious mosaic leading to capturing his elusive head in missions yet to unfold.
ObjectiveText: Look around for a buried stash.
